body.p:
Louisville Ky
March 7 1865
Govr. Bramlette
Dr Sir

Judge Handlin of Livingston Ky will hand you this and also a petition for the pardon of Pinckney Clemons he will give you the particulars which will make it unnecessary for me -- I was present and one of the attorneys for the plff in an action of Trespass when all the facts were had & heard and I do not hesitate in Saying in this particular case that executive clemency might with great propriety be exercised
